entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
